name: Online (With 0 Others)
description:
small walkable moodpiece for the "dying mmo jam"

Estimated running time: 5 minutes.

Controls: 

WASD to move, use the mouse to look

inspired by:

wandering around alone in the game "red desert render" (by ian maclarty)

thinking about how time doesn't make any sense

thinking about countless hours spent wandering around "the barrens" in WoW

tools/assets used:

fungus

flat kit

Keijiro Takahashi's datamosh shader
